title: New: Kiran Leonard – Port-Ainé
content:
This technically isn’t new, especially to Kiran Leonard himself who first wrote Port-Ainé when he was in his early teens.

Now at the mighty old age of 18, Kiran is set to release his debut album, Bowler Hat Soup, through the wonderful Hand of Glory Records, and the brilliant Port-Ainé is due out as a single from the album.

Kiran’s lyrical ability is outstanding, however what truly makes his music staggeringly special is his method of weaving precise dynamics into his tracks. Port-Ainé is ideal evidence of this, as the track’s undulating tempo allows for aching moments of emotional fragility to be coupled with thrusts of resurgent percussion.

You can pre-order Bowler Hat Soup here, and we wholeheartedly recommend you do so.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
